instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00281 LEFT USBC  Charing but No USB funstions. Right side works fine.
threads.message:
Hi All,

This board is not a liquid damaged. Board is clean.

using all 4 usb ports can charge. But only right side ports work for usb funstions.

Left side No light on usb-c adaptors but can the macbook charge.

Can you give a point where to start with?

threads.title: 820-00281 LEFT USBC  Charing but No USB funstions. Right side works fine.
threads.message: Tried with another USB-C board still same. left side both ports no USB functions.

threads.title: 820-00281 LEFT USBC  Charing but No USB funstions. Right side works fine.
threads.message: Inspect area of U3100/3200 chips more closely, maybe there is some corrosion you have missed. I would replace them both too as they are USB-C contollers. Also inspect J3300 and components around for corrosion or damages.

threads.title: 820-00281 LEFT USBC  Charing but No USB funstions. Right side works fine.
threads.message:
HI , Thank you for your quick reply. 
My question is as i get 20v and and charging with out any issue, should i touch U3100,3200? 
I thought U2800 works dierectly with J3300 in regards to USB functions. Please correct me if im wrong. Thank you.

threads.title: 820-00281 LEFT USBC  Charing but No USB funstions. Right side works fine.
threads.message: Also J3300 and around components pretty clean and no burnt caps.

threads.title: 820-00281 LEFT USBC  Charing but No USB funstions. Right side works fine.
threads.message:
If the problem is related with U3100/200, then check the voltage at L3500.
You should get 5V there, when an USB device is connected.

threads.title: 820-00281 LEFT USBC  Charing but No USB funstions. Right side works fine.
threads.message: Hi 2info, I get only 0.2v with USB adaptor connected on L3500. DIode mode 0.166v.

threads.title: 820-00281 LEFT USBC  Charing but No USB funstions. Right side works fine.
threads.message:
Post U3500 voltage, pins 15, 19, 20, 7.
Be sure R3509/39 and C3516 are all good.
You can compare values in diode mode around U3500 with UB700.

threads.title: 820-00281 LEFT USBC  Charing but No USB funstions. Right side works fine.
threads.message: U3500, pin 15 3.3v, 19,20,7 0v. Compare with working board U3500 diode mode values are same.

threads.title: 820-00281 LEFT USBC  Charing but No USB funstions. Right side works fine.
820-00281 LEFT USBC  Charing but No USB funstions. Right side works fine.
threads.message: my bad. pin 19,20 get 5V, so pp5v_s4 is present. Missing voltage on pin 7.

threads.title: 820-00281 LEFT USBC  Charing but No USB funstions. Right side works fine.
threads.message: pin 19 voltage hold only for couple of sec.

threads.title: 820-00281 LEFT USBC  Charing but No USB funstions. Right side works fine.
threads.message:
You don't need another board.
UB700 area is the same as U3500.
For voltage comparison, you MUST connect USB device to corresponding ports.
Enable signal will come high only if a device is detected.
